accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Mona Jean Breit Scrapbook, Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center on 01/11/2010.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessioned and minimally processed in January 2010 by Ute Schechter, Warren E. Burger Archivist.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Further information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki:http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Mona_Jean_Breit.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Scrapbook, 1947-1948, of Mona Jean Breit, documenting her girl club activities with the Hollywood-Willshire Camp Fire Girls. Included are notes on training and rules, honors activities, programs, drawings, clippings, napkins, certificates.Also included is a 1860 marriage certificate for S.M. Griffin and L.A. Simpson of Jefferson County, Pennsylvania.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.
